title: Sound: D
story_text: Dex the dog digs a big hole in Dad's garden.
Danny the duck dances with delight as the daisies sway.
Dan plays drums loudly during dinner.
Donuts disappear when Danny comes near.
A deer darts down the dusty road.

questions.question: Which letter sound is this lesson about?
Can you think of a word with the sound 'd'?
